Title: Mine Disposal, the Goblin Way
Description:
The paratroopers have mined the beach!

The Warchief asked me if there's anything we can do about that. I told him, 'You bet we can!'. I was thinking maybe you could take this satchel of grenades and detonate the land mines from a safe distance?

It's how we do things, right?!
CompletionText:
Boss, do you think you could go back down there and detonate a few more?

Thanks!
RewardText: Score one for the goblins! Stupid dwarves and gnomes.
